title: Hermitian Yang-Mills functionals on direct images
abstract:
For a polarized family of complex projective manifolds, we study the
Hermitian Yang-Mills functionals on the sequence of vector bundles over the
base of the family associated with direct image sheaves of the tensor powers of
the polarization. We make a connection between the asymptotic minimization of
these functionals, for big tensor powers of the polarization, and the
minimization of the so-called Wess-Zumino-Witten functional defined on the
space of all relatively K\"ahler $(1, 1)$-forms on the fibration. We establish
the sharp lower bounds on the latter functional in terms of the limiting
Harder-Narasimhan measure, which is a certain algebraic invariant of the
family. As an application, in a fibered setting, we prove an asymptotic
converse to the Andreotti-Grauert theorem conjectured by Demailly.
